mapper.select: SELECT id, plan_id, batch_no, day_age, record_type, SUM( breeding_value ) AS breeding_value, unit, ENABLE FROM breeding_record WHERE ENABLE = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = #{todayDate} GROUP BY plan_id, record_type

SELECT plan_id , batch_no, coop_id, day_age, SUM( CASE WHEN record_type = 1 THEN breeding_value END ) AS breeding_value, create_time FROM breeding_record WHERE enable = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{todayDate} GROUP BY plan_id,coop_id

SELECT count(breeding_value) as breeding_value FROM breeding_record WHERE enable = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( #{createTime}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND coop_id = #{coopId} AND plan_id = #{planId} AND record_type = 1

SELECT SUM( breeding_value ) FROM breeding_record WHERE enable = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( #{createTime}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND coop_id = #{coopId} AND plan_id = #{planId} AND record_type = 4

SELECT r.plan_id, r.batch_no, r.day_age, CASE WHEN r.record_type = 1 THEN SUM( r.breeding_value ) END AS fodder_amount, CASE WHEN r.record_type = 4 THEN SUM( r.breeding_value ) END AS dead_amount, r.unit, r.ENABLE, p.technician_id AS technician_id, p.technician AS technician , p.plan_chicken_quantity as plan_chicken_quantity FROM breeding_record r INNER JOIN breeding_plan p ON r.plan_id = p.id WHERE r.enable = 1 AND p.enable = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT( r.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = #{todayDate} GROUP BY r.plan_id
SELECT sum(breeding_value) as breeding_value FROM breeding_record WHERE enable = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = #{todayDate} AND plan_id = #{planId} AND record_type = 4
